name: Shankd'
description:
Soo you are in a small town with a bunch of people who just hate you and wants to kill you.

So shank em' before you get killed!

Controls:
W to move up.
A to move left.
S to move down.
D to move right.

F to shank.

Left Click to shoot gun.

oh yea by the way i made this in a day
